name: 華國媛
objective: 蛋白質體學工程學，是結合蛋白質生化技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於蛋白質生化技術的快速發展，蛋白質序列的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。蛋白質體工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
schedule:
Week/ Date 	Title
1.		Central dogma in the life?
2.		Amino acid, peptides & proteins
3.		Protein purification 1
4.		Protein purification 2
5.		Gel & Western Analysis
6.		LC & Mass-spec analysis
7.		Human genome project
8.		Protein database
9.		Mid-term exam (45%)
10.		Sample preparation
11.		2D electrophoresis & image analysis
12.		Protein ID & Mascot
13.		Basic bioinformatics in proteomics
14.		Protein Chip
15.		Cell array
16.		Proteomics in biomedical researches
17.		Proteomics in biomedical researches
18.		Final EXAM (45%)
scorePolicy: 評量標準: Mid-term (45%) +Final Exam (45%) + Class attendance (10%)
materials:
1. Lehninger’s Principles of Biochemistry,  2004, 4th ed by D. Nelson & M. Cox
2. Molecular Biology of the Cell, 2007,  6th ed, by Bruce Alberts , et al.
3. Protein biochemistry and proteomics , 2006 by Hubert Rehm.
